\SetAPI{J}
\section{database.connection}
\label{configuration:DatabaseConnection}
\ClearAPI
The URL to the database connection. In most cases it is more suitable to set the properties \ref{configuration:DatabaseProtocol}, \ref{configuration:DatabaseHost}, \ref{configuration:DatabasePort} and \ref{configuration:DatabaseName}, \AMBETH will build the connection string by itself.
